text: Priya Agraharam is a village in Polaki mandal of Srikakulam district, Andhra Pradesh, India. ==Geography== Priya or Priya Agraharam is located at .Falling Rain Genomics.Priya It has an average elevation of 15 meters (52 feet). ==Notable personalities== * Sangeeta Kalanidhi Sripada Pinakapani was born in this village.Sripada Pinakapani at Tenth Anniversary souvenir of Sangeetalahari. ==References== Category:Villages in Srikakulam district
title: Priya Agraharam
